name: Stay Safe (itch) (Oboe)
description:
A game made for coursework for my Game Design module. A simple tutorial level with an additional level for testing the players skill, get the highest score possible and watch out for the enemies!

Credits for the following assets:

  • Plywood texture from Texture Haven: https://texturehaven.com/tex/?c=wood&t=plywood
  • Brick texture from Texture Haven: https://texturehaven.com/tex/?c=bricks&t=brick_4
  • Roof texture from Texture Haven: https://texturehaven.com/tex/?c=roofing&t=roof_slates_03
  • Piece moved sound from the BBC Sound Effect archive, sound: '1 woman departs (reprocessed)': http://bbcsfx.acropolis.org.uk/?q=wooden
  • Sweet Pop Acoustic Royalty free by Bensound https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/sweet

    • With special thanks to Lily for being my partner for this coursework! Find her itch.io profile here - https://lilopkins.itch.io/
